website_summaries.verdict: This entry folding mountain bike’s quick-folding design, solid construction, and 21 speeds make the Xspec worth a look for anyone in the market for a collapsible bike.
pros: Available in yellow, white, and black
cons: You’ll have to assemble the Xspec yourself, but YouTube features some handy building tutorials for this model

customer_reviews.title: Great Bicycle
customer_reviews.text: Did not take long to get it put together and then a couple of rides to get it all adjusted and it is great. Tires make noise on gravel and a little on pavement but on grass it was completely silent no rattles or squeaks not even any noise from the chain. Gears are easy to use and shift. I am a 66 year old women ad I put it all together by myself in about an hour and a half without having any help. Now I have a bike to take with the motor home on vacations without putting a bicycle rack on it.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Carol

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, bad pedals
customer_reviews.text: This is a first impression after purchasing and test run, i.e. before extensive using. PROS: solid frame; disk breaks work great. CONS: Cheap low quality pedals are not usable, need to be replaced right away (main reason for one star down rating); Front wheel came slightly bent (not a transportation damage), needs adjustment; Seat post is too short for 5.11 person, need to be replaced with the longer one; Gear shifters work fine, but made from thin light cheap plastic (unusual for Shimano); Manual is for the different model with traditional (not disk) breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ozov

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: The assembly took a bit as there are no instructions but with a YouTube video you can get it done. As others have said the tires are not the greatest. Truthfully you're paying for the frame so it's a great frame and folds well. Fits into my truck of my Camry well enough. There isn't room for much else. The bike does have some weight to it so be prepaid for that. The bike itself works great. No issues at all there. Lastly good luck figuring out the mud cover attaching on. I feel like I was just given random pieces for it. I wasn't going to install it any way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bike and rides smooth
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write alot of reviews but feel I need to about this bike. I can’t think of a single thing that is wrong with it.... the Xtra bicycle is fun to ride and packaging was excellent! Really like the disk brakes, shifter paddles, and double lock where it folds. Assembly was not difficult at all. Instructions were pretty useless but utube video took care of that. Give this bike a good look at if you are looking for a sharp well built bicycle. Free shipping on Amazon prime too.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Good bicycle with a cheap pedal
customer_reviews.text: The bicycle looks good. However, the right pedal bearing breaks no longer than 2 weeks. The beads of the bearing keep dropping so the inside is unbalanced and thus when I was riding the beads keep coming off and I am pretty sure there would be no beads inside after few rides. And this is very dangerous, because when the beads came off, they would stuck the pedal and it could not rotate properly. There were many times I slipped off the pedal on road, and thank god my speed was low so I did not fall on the ground. And now the pedal is loose and hard to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Dong Xu

customer_reviews.title: This bike will be returned
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited when the bicycle arrived and was even more excited because half of the bicycle was already put together. I followed all the instructions and even watched videos to make sure I was doing it correctly. The first time I took it out the front wheels made a 90 degree turn almost throwing me from the bike. I fixed the problem but noticed each time I took it for a test ride the screws were getting loose on the brakes. The gears were an even bigger problem, switching gears is not the smoothest on this bike. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Ravendust

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Originally I was sent the wrong product, but once they sent me the correct item, I was happy. The bike is of great quality, and looks very nice. I bought it for my fiance, and he put it together himself. He said that if someone is not mechanically inclined they may not be able to do it, and may want to pay a professional. Overall it's a great bike.
customer_reviews.author: BeachGirl

customer_reviews.title: Meets my "Xspec"tations.
customer_reviews.text: As everyone has said the instructions are just for a 'generic' bike and not this one in particular, however I did get an extra assembly card that showed the mounting for the front wheel/handle bars. Overall I'm really impressed by the bike although I did have to take a rubber mallet to the brake disc pad because it was a tad bit bent from shipping. All in all most of the assembly isn't rocket science although the tuning of the brakes can be tedious (may make sense to just take it into a local bike shop for a tune if you don't want to spend the time fussing with it).
customer_reviews.author: frooglemo

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far. The assembly instructions weren't the greatest but I figured it out without too much trouble. The paint/finish made the pedals hard to screw in; but I got them screwed in with a little extra torque. The pedals fold up and unfold. They are a little iffy though. One pedal feels unsteady under my foot. It's loose folded out. But it hasn't failed. The gears work great. The bike feels sturdy. The suspension is great. Other than the pedals being a bit iffy, the bike feels like a regular mohntain bike. It folds and unfolds easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Alan Tillemans

customer_reviews.title: Giant pain to build, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Per my husband's list: Pros: -Folds nice -Rides smooth -Supports his weight (he's 260) -Different gears Cons: -Packaged instructions suck, took 4 hours to build since its his first bike -Adjusting gears is a giant pain in the a**, more time to adjust the gears -Can do without the mud flaps, but that's a matter of preference -50 pounds, but its a steel frame bike After the pain of building it delivers as promised and at an affordable price. Lost ten pounds and am satisfied with the purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Siu

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Assemble was easy, but when you ride this bike it sounds like it's about to break down to pieces. Gearing is not smooth at all! There is some type of squeaky noise I can't figure out where it comes from and it keeps getting worse. I rode this bike 3 times in total and every time I regret not keeping the box for a return. It's so bad I don't even want to ride it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Gears and brakes are garbage
customer_reviews.text: Buy a different bike I am a carpenter so I am good at fixing things. I had to adjust the brakes and gears about 10x already and I had it for about 4 weeks at this point I just leave it in second gear because I am so sick and tired of fixing it just but another bike and save your money
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: INSTRUCTIONS ARE HORRIBLE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Says "some assembly required" but the instructions are translated horribly and worse off, it's for a different set-up bike. If you are not mechanically inclined you are most likely going to have to pay to have the bike assembled. Instructions don't show how to put on the mudguards, the instructions are for different handle bars and different brake set-up, not for the disk brakes up front. Otherwise the bike seems sturdy. I do like that the pedals fold up, don't like that the handlebar is fixed. Again, if your mechanically inclined, you'll figure it out; if you aren't, think about the added cost of assembly when making your purchase. Happy Trails!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: First, you should know that 42 pounds is a lot. I got this because I needed something I could keep inside easily, but I will definitely look for a lighter bike instead. Also, the second time I rode it, the chain retainer broke off and I had to force it back on to get back home. You get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: roflplatypus

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Tho the bike out of the box had loads of issues. (Bent and or broken derailer/cables/valve stems) With lots and lots of time and replacement parts it was finally rideable. All in all it's ok. Only saving grace is the frame ... so far so good there.
customer_reviews.author: Random54386

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike
customer_reviews.text: Finally got the bike today in Trinidad and Tobago, and I like it. However, the locking washers for the front wheel and the screws for the fenders did not come. Also, on my test ride after mounting up the bike, the chain popped open. Apparently the lock on the master link was missing. So now I can't ride my bike until it back the link. Other than that, the bike is good.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Steele

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Cost $$
customer_reviews.text: Not too cheap not too expensive the most excellent packaging I have ever seen in any type of shipment that I have received from anyone very well-thought-out engineered bike if you are mechanically inclined you can do this and assembly at yourself. the rear end is already pre-assembled the hard part you just have to put the front end together piece of cake if your mechanically inclined if you're not have someone knowledgeable build it for you it will be worth it highly recommend this mtn bike I'm a 60 year old man have worn out knees and I'm a diabetic it's going to help me get out there and get better.!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Shelnutt,61 yo man Alabama USA

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared for hard work, worth paying $75 for professional install.
customer_reviews.text: Bike looks good, construction is solid. Just be prepared for a time consuming effort. It took me 3 hours total without instructions. B'coz you won't get a straight forward guidance. And specially the front breaks install was a total self learning. No a bad product for price
customer_reviews.author: ^Que3st^

customer_reviews.title: XSPEC 26” 21 speed folding commuter / mountain bike!
customer_reviews.text: Great light weight commuter / mountain bike and super low price for everything including front and back disc weather resistant brakes, front and rear-adjustable shock suspension . 21 speed bike is nicely detailed and great flat black paint! Much better construction and.nice Shamono Gt Components! Folding takes some practice. Fast and safe shipping. Very happy biker! 5 out of 5!
customer_reviews.author: cbreview

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2, white for my wife and black for myself. After carefully reviewing all the reviews on Amazon, I was little hesitant before purchasing this bike as I never assembled bike myself before. However, it was really easy to assemble, and the only problem I had was calibrating the break, not to make noise as well as stop instantly. It took longer to calibrate but other than that, it was smooth and easy. As other stated, I also had few spokes bent on both bikes but not a big deal. Great bikes!
customer_reviews.author: Minwoo Kang

customer_reviews.title: Good bike, not that difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Watched YouTube instruction, took about 2 hours to put together. But the last piece doesn’t fit. Seems the back splash hood holder design is still old one, but the seat tube has been upgraded to bigger diameter. Used saw to cut a little to be able to fit. Otherwise should be 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Terry Hua

customer_reviews.title: If you have a little extra to pay for a foldable bike, you should try this one.
customer_reviews.text: Requires attentiveness of the assembler, but when you buy it, you get a confirmation email with a video which is significantly helpful. Good quality but a bit pricier than I initially opted to pay. Since this folds in half it saves room and that makes it worth it since I drive a Honda Accord (fits in the trunk).
customer_reviews.author: Erica Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, folds nicely to be stored. Only thing is I’m 6’1” and I wish I got something a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Holmes A Oquendo

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Fits in a prius c if you fold down the back seats. It will take up the whole back seats and trunk tho. -1 star because of the poor fender adjustment. It slides while cruising down even when tighten up. They could have used grooves in the screws to prevent this.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio A.

customer_reviews.title: It's a foldable mountain bike what more can I say, it fits anywhere with little room to take
customer_reviews.text: It's an entry level mountain bike, runs smooth on the road, I try it off road and it was OK, there are a couple of things you might want to upgrade, but it's great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Joan L. Sosa Corniel

customer_reviews.title: Great bike !!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bike! I’ve had it for about 6 months now and have had no problems with it. There are YouTube videos to help with assembly if you have trouble. Although, assembly was pretty straight forward. It folds up and fits in the back of my Ford Escape no problem. So size is perfect for what I was looking at. Good luck finding any bike with this level of quality at this price range. It simply cannot be best. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Noah Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This is not a mountain bike!
customer_reviews.text: Description is a bit misleading, this is not a mountain bike. It simply don't have enough structural integrity. It's OK folding bike, but expect it to be bit heavier then non-folded model.
customer_reviews.author: Karpol

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have basic hex tools to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: It assembles ok. One of the spokes on the front wheel was bent opening the box. This caused the front wheel to be slightly untrue and required adjustment of the front disk brake pads. Aside from that assembly was easy. Overall is is a decent value for the money. Just make sure you are familiar with assembly of a bike and basic troubleshooting.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kinner

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!  Great seller!
customer_reviews.text: The bike is well made. Didn't take too long to put together. I did have a broken spoke that happened during the shipping process at no fault of the seller. I contacted the seller and a new wheel was shipped out promptly. I haven't had a chance to ride the bike outside yet but did ride it using my trainer. Everything works great. All gears and the brakes. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: A good buy at the price.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good value bike, for a good price. Disc brakes front and rear & shimano trigger shifters are both new for me, and work very well.
customer_reviews.author: corpsof68

customer_reviews.title: you'll need to put more money into this bike.
customer_reviews.text: you'll need to put more money into this bike. Like the Pedals, bike stem replaced for a medal one; and some Full Fenders. I'd trash the bike seat. hay at lease the bike frame is good and does the job at folding in haft!
customer_reviews.author: John T Viles

customer_reviews.title: Just for light rides
customer_reviews.text: Screws are very fragiles, owner manual the worst, shifter too hard
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Pujol

customer_reviews.title: BUY NEW PEDALS!!
customer_reviews.text: The bike is solid and a great value for the money. Other reviews mention to buy new pedals immediately, I wish I had seen those reviews. My right pedal broke mid-ride yesterday and I wrecked hard. If you get new pedals the bike is awesome. The instructions are kind of hard to understand but once it's assembled it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike for convenient travel.
customer_reviews.text: Good Material, abit heavy, but for pricepoint its good. Convenient to assemble out of box. Gears are awesome to cycle through. Seat is kinda hard. But you can get use to after a a week or 2 of cycling.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Nice and steady.  Folding feature is a plus
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike. Got it for my daughter and she loves it. I wasn't sure about the quality, but ones it was built together (highly recommend to have a professional do it for you) the bike looks very nice and steady. Also, living in a small place with limited storage the folding feature is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. To easier assembly check out YouTube videos. It took me about 30min.
customer_reviews.author: Xoxo

customer_reviews.title: I'd say 5 but the instructions make no sense, ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd say 5 but the instructions make no sense, only assembly guide was for the fork, if you're tech savvy and lay everything out you'll be ok. Finished under 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: will cochrane

customer_reviews.title: Directions accepted
customer_reviews.text: Had some problems assembling the bike in that there was no directions. I ended by cross threading the pedals and the cranks. I, luckily, have a bike shop close and spent $80 to fix and tune it.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Taylor Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This bike is a piece of garbage don't give your money to these con artists. The front gears were bent, there's something wrong with the back wheel bearings and the fork bends as you ride might be the front shocks I'm not sure. Took it to a shop they told me to get my money back the handlebar grips good though. I will be getting my money back
customer_reviews.author: Genesis666

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike went together well. I have not had time to fully check out the bike due to weather but plan on it as soon as weather turns
customer_reviews.author: Kim Holtsclaw

customer_reviews.title: Ride to ride.
customer_reviews.text: Love how can fold it and put it in ur trunk car. Only thing seat didn’t like too small for my big butt. So I replaced the bigger seat. Like color very bright. Does get rusty if leave outside for the rain. So try not get it wet. I still ride it. Enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Leila

customer_reviews.title: ..many better options online.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly constructed.....parts missing...not a great bike....poor customer service...many better options online.
customer_reviews.author: J Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: This bike is for people who weigh less than 200lbs. No good if you re big and tall guy.
customer_reviews.text: If you weigh more than 200lbs, I don't think this bike is for you. It's a very nice bike by the way, but I had to change it. I'm thinking on trading it somewhere else, It will take be so much headache for me to go have the bike store to take it apart. In overall, I lost so much money from this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pardovani Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: It is not a bite. It is a junk. Steering wheel is not stable so my son almost break his leg. This bite is worse than 100$ bite in Walmart. The seller said I have to pay shipping for return so I have to pay shipping cost 200$. I do not think they return full amount so I decide threw away.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Bought this in the end of last year, with professional installation.
customer_reviews.text: Always with this bike type get the professional installation, the accompanied instructions are good but this is such a pain to assemble by your own.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Decent bike.
customer_reviews.text: Front disk tends to rub against pad. Seat can easily be replaced with a more comfortable one. May change review after a week or two.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Pack and go!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, perfect! Fits in the back of my Subaru, Assembly required as expected.
customer_reviews.author: TheDefiantRam

customer_reviews.title: Missing 6 screws!! Couldn't assemble front disc brake
customer_reviews.text: Missing screws, so had to go to bike shop... had them finish and check assembly. Assembly instructions are very poor!
customer_reviews.author: Peter P.

customer_reviews.title: Product is rough and tough for New York City streets.😎
customer_reviews.text: I want to ride back and forth to work, 3 miles there 3 miles back. This bike is perfect for these New York City streets. Thank you. 😎
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Useful and reliable
customer_reviews.text: SO, there were no instructions. That meant I had to drop it off at a bike shop. I don't take chances putting on BRAKES wrong. I'm 5' 11" and 230lbs. It seems a little small to me- I was using a 29" frame bike. IF there were folding pedals and a sort of quick release on the handle bars so that they turned, it would be great! But it works to get around town. The shocks are reliable enought to hop 4 inch curbs with no problems. The gearing is low, so speed downhill is limited. Overall, good. However, with a few tweaks in design it could be great.
customer_reviews.author: Obi Wanna

customer_reviews.title: Good Ride. Doesn't Fit in Tesla Model 3
customer_reviews.text: Great bike! would recommend to anyone for the price. only issue is when folded; It didn't fit in the trunk of my Tesla Model 3
customer_reviews.author: SupremeSal

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Putting the bike together took 4-5 hours, so expect that for some one who has never biked before, maybe a little more. Youtube video helps We took it to a test run, so far so good. Good bike for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Dooi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Seller great eye for dynamic bikes
customer_reviews.text: My seller has a dynamic eye for a beautiful bike and my wife was surprised and over the moon with her gift. We plan on getting a his bike as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: I guess?
customer_reviews.text: Did not arrive with tools necessary for assembly OR instructions for assembly, packaging was extremely messy, arrived with one of the plastic rings broken. Whenever I can complete assembly, I'll consider doing an update.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: The video instruction  link in the menu is NOT there at all
customer_reviews.text: There is one assembly instruction on YouTube, it includes major part, but miss a lot details.
customer_reviews.author: zhang xuetao

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: For the price this bike “ nailed it” great looking smooth ride. Directions to put it together could be made easier. Love the folding option. No more bike rack. Shape looking bike.
customer_reviews.author: philobaby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.Good Value.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install.Good Value.I put it together easily and quickly . Really only had to attach handle bars ,front wheel ,pedals and seat.Probably 1hr to assemble with tools.Bike is sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Works great. No instructions to put it together.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. No instructions to put it together. The seller sends you a video link. Not the best video, but not super hard to put together.
customer_reviews.author: JeanLuc

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design, but very difficult to put together and some parts came broken.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Hales

customer_reviews.title: Good looking sturdy bike
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son’s birthday. He used the video and put it together pretty quickly. He skipped the fenders and it looks great! Sturdy good looking bike! He’s happy I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shipping box damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Bicycle looks great. Arrived on time but seat had a hole. Shipping box pretty beaten.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Total POS
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy. Chain skips off consultanty. POS! Do not order this for any reason unless you like being mangled by the pavement after this beast bucks you off.
customer_reviews.author: TZ

customer_reviews.title: The packaging may be damaged and the bike may have some damage on it.
customer_reviews.text: I like how it came all together. The brakes are good.it comes with folding pedals ,straps and the handlebars fold too. I am giving it 4 stars because the front has a dent and it was hard to install the forks but I got it working.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Great bike so far.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a month now. Great bike so far. Needed to be tuned and brakes calibrated. Customer service is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great for moderate biking and traveling.
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying these bikes very much. I would say that extreme mountain biking would not be suitable for these bikes tho.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Handled heavy mountain biking perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly light, securely and stably folds and unfolds in 10 seconds, was able to handle downhill trials packed with rocks and tree roots at full speed. Spent $75 for professional assembly at a bike shop and $15 for soft, ergonomic grips. Still need to get front shock stiffened and a mountain bike back tire for better grip uphill. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly . Easy to assemble just takes time . Bike is half built only for shipping purposes . Super fast and friendly customer service . Definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: A very bad deal for a malfunctioning bike
customer_reviews.text: Bad parts and not worth the money. Worse than 98USD mountain bike in Walmart. The frame is very heavy. The chain is so easy to broke. Worst bike I have in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Cool bike
customer_reviews.text: This was a christmas gift. Nice looking bike. Some of the washers were missing and bolts. Overall my husband loves it
customer_reviews.author: Rebel Torossian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a great purchase, this bike spectacular, and the support of the company that sells them is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Elias Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts make people unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Meet expectation, but missing one screw..... don’t know where to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Hei Dun

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: Very good bicycle. I started to enjoy my weekend rides in central park. The ride is very smooth. I'm 6'1 and 220 lb and it fits me perfectly. I will recommend this to everyone looking to buy a bike to enjoy the summer. You will not regret it
customer_reviews.author: Rockalex

customer_reviews.title: Best bicycle
customer_reviews.text: One of the best bicyle for the price. The quality of the frame and wheels are exceptionally good. Disc Brakes are perfect. Gears shift easily and are smooth to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Sunil Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Their customer service is great. I had received a defective front wheel, they were very responsive and able to ship a new one at the earliest.
customer_reviews.author: Jithendra Jayaram

customer_reviews.title: VM
customer_reviews.text: It will purchase another’s one for sure. Almost half price.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Great bike and seller was awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike for the price. The seller was great! Delivered days before the expected date and very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike easy to put together. Good features, I really like it
customer_reviews.author: Anja M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Well built bike,,,!! I'm 6". 200 lbs. And it Fixs me very well!! The youtube video 📹 was Very helpful in assembly.. It took about 20 mins to assemble,,
customer_reviews.author: Very happy

customer_reviews.title: Customer support is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for price. I’ve been using it with no issues now for two weeks
customer_reviews.author: Kamal

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike not just for the price but for overall.
customer_reviews.author: SONNY MURAO

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve order the bike and found out missing screws. No response. Poor quality and service.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive bike. I ride to work everyday. A must buy.
customer_reviews.author: MONIQUE

customer_reviews.title: For an emergency it's ok - for every day riding, I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for. It's not going to be an everyday ride for me - just sits in my car in case I need an emergency vehicle. No instructions, but it's easy to assemble. Most components are just basic. The length of the handlebars seems like it's for a small child, not an adult. Again, for an emergency it's ok - for every day riding, I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Gorga

customer_reviews.title: great starter bike
customer_reviews.text: Its a great beginners bike. My wife loves it. U don't much but you get what u pay for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good buy for the price! Couple of concerns though: 1. The bike feels as if it's going to crumple upon you on fast rides 2. Upon riding for 10-15 mins for 5 days now, there are some funny squeaking sounds coming in from the main hinge where the bike folds 3. The seat post should have been atleast 350mm long vs 300mm - slight disadvantage if you like a higher riding position 4. The disc brakes need a major adjustment for the initial assembly when you take it out of the box. Expertise required! Outside of the above issues, the bike is good for daily pleasure rides.
customer_reviews.author: mhh7777

customer_reviews.title: Great bike.
customer_reviews.text: Great bike, great price. All you will need when it is delivered is a standard bicycle tool set. No real intructions but pretty easy to assemble for even a novice like me. Going to buy one for my wife. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Soriano

customer_reviews.title: IF you are good with puzzles you will be able to put this ...
customer_reviews.text: let me just say this... IF you are good with puzzles you will be able to put this bike together. the manual they include with this bike is for another bike. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I am glad i bught this bike.... I like it alot!
customer_reviews.author: Felix Lu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bike and good price. Seat isn't the most comfortable but so far that's my only complaint
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good bike but the plastic tier cover was broken and I had to fix it
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: she says it is the best bike she has ever had
customer_reviews.text: The frame is 16" (stamped on the frame) not 26", but this will probably work for anyone under 6'. My wife loves it (she is 5'9"), she says it is the best bike she has ever had. The assembly instructions are useless, but the biggest challenge is installing the front disk brakes (the back disk brakes are already installed). The trick to the brakes is just make sure they are centered. This Bike is probably the best bang for your buck if you are looking for a lot of options and extras (i.e. dual suspension, front and rear disk brakes, and Shimano shifters) for under $300.
customer_reviews.author: Impudent1

customer_reviews.title: Great looks and ride is very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great looks and ride is very nice. When folded it fits in the trunk area well. Assemble easy even without manual.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Micheal Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great Bike!!! Smooth ride. Space saver... took it for a 2 hour ride with no problems, folds up with no problems....
customer_reviews.author: Curtis L.

customer_reviews.title: terrible pain. Wrong installation Manual
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Heavy Heavy!!!!, Seat has to be changed, if not, your riding can not last 10 mins, terrible pain. Wrong installation Manual. Folding is good. I can put it in my civic trunk.
customer_reviews.author: qinggele

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this bike
customer_reviews.text: Wish it would have came with better instructions or the "right" instructions to be more specific. I'm not to keen on the locking system compared to another folding bike I owned. Other than that, the bike is great! Well built, smooth. Love the way the gears shift. I would def recommend this bike. No super light, but hey, it's built tough, what can I say.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike! Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike! Happy with my purchase. Only complaint is I wasn't counting on the weight; bike is heavy as hell, but no other complaints. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay but has some issues
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with instructions to put it together which made it very difficult. The wheel is not perfectly straight so the brakes rub on the wheel and there is nothing that can be done to correct that. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: spotticus

customer_reviews.title: looks great, but
customer_reviews.text: Wow, looks great, but, heavy. Doesn't ride as fluid as I would like. Shocks make up for THAT. After 1 rainstorm & some snow, it squeaks all the time, & felt even more sluggish. No, WD40 was disappointing, considering the effect only lasted for a few minutes at best. It gives me a workout, but, makes it too hard to ride my granddaughter on it & forget uphill, it's a struggle!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rivera Ureta

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike but attached pieces come loose when riding so ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike but attached pieces come loose when riding so always uncertain if bike will come apart while on the road
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Decent.
customer_reviews.text: It will take you a long time to assemble. Does what it is supposed too. Doesn't really fold too small. I would recommend spending the money on a non folding bike and buying a bike rack for your car instead.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

product_meta.title: Xspec 26" 21-Speed Folding Mountain Bike for Adult
feature_bullets: ADVANCED DISC BRAKE SYSTEM- Provides a stronger, faster, more reliable stopping power than the traditional V-Brake Systems. Disc brakes also do not wear out your tires and last much longer. Since disc brakes are much more consistent you’ll be able to judge braking more accurately.
STURDY FOLDABLE FRAME - High tensile steel folding frame that could withstand rough mountain trails and folds flat in seconds with no tools required!
TOP COMPONENTS - Includes quality name brand products that are known to last, including derailleur and shifters. Also includes alloy double wall rims with 26" Diamond wheels.
SUSPENSION SYSTEM - Front & Rear Shock Absorbers that could withstand many tough terrain mountain trails or daily commutes.
Recommended for rider's height 5'3"-6'0". Max weight up to 220lbs - Light Assembly/Tools Required. 30-day warranty included for all orders purchased from the authorized seller, Crosslinks.
